description: Seeking the New York City mayor’s office are seven Democrats, three Republicans and one candidate on the Independence Party’s ballot.
title: A Viewer’s Guide to the N.Y.C. Mayoral Candidates
title_page: A Viewer’s Guide to the N.Y.C. Mayoral Candidates - Interactive Feature - NYTimes.com
text:
John Liu
New York City
Comptroller Raising the minimum
wage to $11.50 an hour. Talking about the scandal
around his campaign. His brothers are all
named after a Kennedy. Populism that can
border on pandering. Outright
hostile. $830,000 home in
Flushing, Queens. Stay tuned. Taking the stand in trial of
former campaign treasurer. Long hours on the trail
will only take him so far.
